owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.tokenAddress: The address of the dream token

params._taxPoolAddress: The address of the tax pool.

params.amount: The amount a user wants to stake

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: The amount a user wants to unstake

params._lotteryRateType: The option type for lottery propertion of tax pool (0 for 25%, 1 for 50%, 2 for 75%)
params._taxRateType: The option type for tax rates (0 for 10%, 1 for 20%, 2 for 30%)

constructor.notice: Setting initial voting options for the dream system

finishElection().notice: Finishing the election by setting the laws to the option with the most votes. resetting the start time restarts a new cycle with the voted laws.

getLotteryRate().notice: Getting current lottery rate for sending correct amount from tax pool to lottery.

setDreamToken(address).notice: setting the reference to the dream token

setTaxPoolAddress(address).notice: Setting the tax pool address by government.

stake(uint256).notice: By staking dream tokens the stakers are gaining votes

unstake(uint256).notice: By unstaking dream tokens the stakers are loosing votes

voteForGovernment(uint8,uint8,uint8).notice: The stakers can vote for each option type of the system

userdoc.notice: This government contract allows users to vote on three different options for collecting taxes in  the dream system on transfering dream tokens - 10%, 20%, or 30% tax on all simple transfers.  In addition the stakers have the option to choose the proportion of the collected taxes in each government cycle, which is send to a lottery contract. The lottery contract should have an external random oracle which is generating a random number. The stakers can participate on the lottery in proportion to their stake. The lottery contract is not implemented yet.
